items.sentence: We have to figure out how much it\'s going to cost us.
We looked out the window, but we didn\'t see anything.
May I come to see you at your office tomorrow morning?
Tom can\'t put up with Mary\'s bad manners any longer.
Tom doesn\'t want anyone in his room while he\'s away.
Have you had enough or do you want to fight some more?
Tom didn\'t watch much television when he was younger.
Tom talks to you more than he talks to any other girl.
Tom told Mary to wait for him in front of the station.
Tom used to live in the same apartment building as me.
I wish we could go back to the way things were before.
Tom told the police that he shot Mary in self-defense.
Tom tried to distract the police so Mary could escape.
Tom should\'ve pretended he didn\'t understand French.
I think we can make it to Boston in about three hours.
I thought Tom would ask Mary to go to Boston with him.
Needless to say, health is more important than wealth.
Now it\'s time for me to discuss a few rules with you.
I know Tom can\'t come to Boston, but I wish he would.
I wonder why Tom didn\'t want to go to Boston with us.
